name: firewall-management-system
description: A comprehensive firewall management application with Node.js backend and Next.js frontend

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd Backend && npm install && cd ../Frontend/my-app && npm install
scripts.clean: npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:frontend
scripts.clean:backend: cd Backend && rm -rf node_modules dist coverage
scripts.clean:frontend: cd Frontend/my-app && rm -rf node_modules .next out build

author: Lior Yanuka
